column4: Tesla delivers quarterly record of 25 000 vehicles in Q1
column5: NEW YORK  April 2 Tesla Inc  the U.S. luxury electric car maker  said on Sunday first-quarter vehicle deliveries jumped 69 percent from a year ago to a quarterly record of 25 000 vehicles  bouncing back from delays in the previous quarter.
* delivered just over 25 000 vehicles in Q1  of which approx 13 450 were model s and approx 11 550 were model X
